title: Set project domain to techmarket-digital and deploy live to IC mainnet

requirements.text: Set the project domain/slug to "techmarket-digital" wherever the app’s deployment/project configuration stores the domain value, ensuring it meets the platform validation rules (5–50 chars; only letters, numbers, and hyphens).

quotes: Set the project domain to: techmarket-digital

acceptanceCriteria: The configured project domain/slug value is exactly: techmarket-digital.
Domain validation passes (length between 5 and 50; contains only letters, numbers, and hyphens).

requirements.text: Deploy (“push live”) the latest frontend and backend canisters to Internet Computer mainnet after the domain is set, and record the resulting live URL and canister IDs in frontend/DEPLOYED_MAINNET.md.
acceptanceCriteria: A successful mainnet deployment is completed for both frontend and backend canisters.
frontend/DEPLOYED_MAINNET.md is filled with the live site URL and the frontend/backend canister IDs produced by this deployment.
The live site URL loads successfully in a browser.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor with all logic in backend/main.mo; add backend/migration.mo only if an upgrade requires state migration.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose them instead.
Deployment must use only free Internet Computer hosting options (no paid providers, no subscriptions).
nonGoals: Setting up or managing an external/custom DNS domain outside of the Internet Computer canister URL (e.g., custom domain mapping).
Adding any new product features or changing existing site content/copy beyond what is required to set the project domain and deploy.
